# Holy Fire (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Fire Spells|fire]], [[Good Spells|good]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[3rd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Forge of War (WotC), pg. 114

*Your holy symbol and your eyes erupt in a blaze of silver fire.*

All undead within range of your next turning attempt (if you make it before this spellâ€™s duration expires) are especially vulnerable to the attempt. Whether you succeed in turning them or not, the undead take hit point damage equal to the result of your turning damage roll. This damage is half fire and half sacred energy.
